questions.question: What does a CROSS JOIN produce?
options: All matching rows from both tables
A Cartesian product of rows from both tables
No results if keys don't match
questions.answer: A Cartesian product of rows from both tables

questions.question: Is CROSS JOIN the same as INNER JOIN?
options: Only when used with WHERE clause

questions.question: Which clause is typically not used with CROSS JOIN?
CROSS JOIN without a WHERE clause returns:
options: Combination of all rows from both tables
questions.answer: Combination of all rows from both tables

questions.question: How many rows are returned if Table A has 3 rows and Table B has 2 rows using CROSS JOIN?
Which SQL clause is optional with CROSS JOIN?
What keyword performs a CROSS JOIN?
CROSS JOIN is useful when:
Which of the following is a valid CROSS JOIN query?
options: SELECT * FROM A CROSS JOIN B;
SELECT * FROM A OUTER JOIN B;
SELECT * FROM A FULL JOIN B;
SELECT * FROM A RIGHT JOIN B;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM A CROSS JOIN B;

questions.question: If Table A has 10 rows and Table B has 4, how many rows result from A CROSS JOIN B?
Show all combinations of colors and sizes for a product.
options: SELECT * FROM colors CROSS JOIN sizes;
SELECT * FROM sizes INNER JOIN colors;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM colors CROSS JOIN sizes;

questions.question: List all day-time slot combinations for booking availability.
options: SELECT * FROM days CROSS JOIN time_slots;
SELECT * FROM days INNER JOIN time_slots;
SELECT * FROM time_slots LEFT JOIN days;
SELECT * FROM days OUTER JOIN time_slots;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM days CROSS JOIN time_slots;

questions.question: Create a schedule for all employees for each shift.
options: SELECT * FROM employees CROSS JOIN shifts;
SELECT * FROM employees FULL JOIN shifts;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM employees CROSS JOIN shifts;

questions.question: Generate all combinations of coupons and regions for a promo campaign.
options: SELECT * FROM coupons CROSS JOIN regions;
SELECT * FROM regions OUTER JOIN coupons;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM coupons CROSS JOIN regions;

questions.question: Retrieve every user with every permission for auditing purposes.
options: SELECT * FROM users CROSS JOIN permissions;
SELECT * FROM users OUTER JOIN permissions;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN permissions ON id;
SELECT * FROM users FULL JOIN permissions;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM users CROSS JOIN permissions;

questions.question: Create a match-up table for players vs. tournaments.
options: SELECT * FROM players CROSS JOIN tournaments;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM players CROSS JOIN tournaments;

questions.question: List every course offered at each location.
options: SELECT * FROM courses CROSS JOIN locations;
SELECT * FROM locations INNER JOIN courses;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM courses CROSS JOIN locations;

questions.question: Show all combinations of projects and possible statuses.
options: SELECT * FROM projects CROSS JOIN statuses;
SELECT * FROM statuses OUTER JOIN projects;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM projects CROSS JOIN statuses;

questions.question: Find every item pairing between item1 and item2 lists.
options: SELECT * FROM item1 CROSS JOIN item2;
SELECT * FROM item1 OUTER JOIN item2;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM item1 CROSS JOIN item2;

questions.question: Display all employee-day combinations for shift planning.
options: SELECT * FROM employees CROSS JOIN days;
SELECT * FROM days LEFT JOIN employees;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM employees CROSS JOIN days;
